name: Lightning Simulator
description:
Lightning Simulator is a simple air to air combat flight simulator offering the ability to record and play back your victories in the English Electric Lightning jet fighter.
The game has six missions that involve in flight re-fueling and chasing down and dispatching of bogies. Once the enemy is locked in your targets, weapons are used automatically resulting in its destruction. When weapons are engaged the camera turns on and rolls while the weapons systems are active.
